about.title: 质押去繁就简.
about.text: Stkr是一个去中心化质押协议平台，它在传统质押的基础上加入了非托管、微池、即时流动性和去中心化治理等元素。

calculate.title: 计算您的收益
calculate.subtitle: 这个计算器是根据每年15%的质押奖励来估算的。

features.title: 为什么选择Stkr
features.text: Ankr's Eth2 staking 解旨在提供最佳的用户体验和最高级别的安全性，用户在获得丰厚质押奖励的同时， 也通过类债券的合成代币aETH获得了流动性。
features.micropool-text: 质押金额无门槛，从最低0.5ETH到最高1,000ETH，自动加入微池。
features.manager-text: 发送所有ETH仅需一次交易，Stkr会自动把您的资金分配到表现良好的池子。
features.liquidity-text: 有了aETH，你可以持有或随时交易你的质押资金，不需要等到以太坊2.0转账功能开启。
features.security-text: 资金由您自己保管，始终保持对资产的完全控制。

become-provider.title: 成为提供商
become-provider.text: 通过在Ankr上运行以太坊2.0节点成为供应商，无需任何硬件或技术知识。
become-provider.api-text: 通过即时API访问以太坊的各种测试网和主网，轻松构建Web3产品。
become-provider.knowledge-text: 通过在Ankr上运行以太坊 2.0节点，不需要任何硬件或技术知识。
become-provider.governance-text: 成为治理人，影响有关Stkr平台发展的决策。

faq.title: 常见问题解答
faq.question-1: Can I stake if I have less than 32 ETH?
faq.answer-1: Yes! To democratize access to Ethereum 2.0 for users who are unable to invest 32 ETH (the fixed amount required by the network), Ankr staking introduces Micropools – a proprietary solution that enables you to start staking with as little as 0.5 ETH. Simply choose the amount you want to delegate, and the system will automatically assign it to the best providers.
faq.answer-2: The Micropools mechanism is our unique solution for breaking down the economic barriers for Ethereum 2.0 staking. As the name implies, Micropools allow users to chip in smaller portions of ETH towards a Validator, and receive a proportionate reward based on their contribution.
faq.answer-3: Ankr's liquid staking protocol allows ETH holders to participate in Ethereum 2.0 staking and earn staking rewards, without running a node and locking your ETH for an unknown period of time.
faq.question-4: How will my stake become liquid if I stake them before transactions are enabled on Ethereum 2.0?
faq.answer-4: Ankr effectively tackles the illiquidity issue of Ethereum 2.0 by introducing aETH which will enable you to trade your stake or utilize it in DeFi protocols to earn yield at any point in time.
faq.question-5: How can I redeem my staked ETH and staking rewards?
faq.answer-5:
Until transactions are enabled on Ethereum 2.0 you can simply trade your aETH for ETH. 1 aETH should become worth more than 1 ETH over time.

As soon as Ethereum 2.0 transactions are enabled, you can use your aETH to redeem your ETH stake plus your staking rewards.
faq.answer-6: aETH is a synthetic derivative asset which represents your ETH stake plus earned staking rewards. When you stake your ETH with Ankr, you can redeem aETH tokens, which you can choose to keep in self custody, trade or use in DeFi products to earn yield.
faq.question-7: I have more than 32 ETH. Can I still stake with Ankr?
faq.answer-7: Despite that Ethereum 2.0 only enables you to stake multiples of 32 ETH, with Ankr you can stake all your tokens at once, without having to allocate them to multiple nodes. This means you can even stake 1,000 ETH or more in just one click!
faq.question-8: Can I run my own Ethereum 2.0 node on Ankr?
faq.answer-8: Yes! You can become a provider and run your own node to collect staking rewards. If you don’t have any hardware or technical knowledge to set up a node, you can always use Ankr and deploy your Ethereum 2.0 node in one click.
faq.question-9: What do I need to become a node provider on the platform?
faq.answer-9: To become a node provider and earn platform fees, you need to set up an Ethereum 2.0 node with a minimum “insurance” stake of 2 ETH to compensate users in case of slashing events.
faq.question-10: Can I use my ANKR tokens on the platform?
faq.answer-10: Yes! If you own enough ANKR tokens, you can participate in governance and vote on key parameters to define the future of the platform.

features.1: 质押任意数量的ETH（最低0.5ETH）来赚取奖励。
features.2: 让你的质押资金保持流动性，通过aETH交易，出售，参与DeFi应用。

features.1: 运行以太坊2.0节点，从质押奖励和平台费中获得收益。
features.2: 在你的节点上质押额外的Ankr获得更高的信誉等级，并让你的微池被优先考虑，赚取更多的奖励。
features.3: 使用Ankr平台托管您的节点，消除一切技术运营障碍，避免任何罚没风险。

stake.title: 质押管理
stake.staking-period-tooltip: 这是您的代币在智能合约中被锁定的月数。
stake.yearly-earning-tooltip: 可期望每年从质押中赚取这个数额。请注意，这只是一个估计。

validation.balance-exceed: 您输入的数值超过了您的余额

stake.agreement: 我明白我的质押资金在Eth 2.0质押期间被锁定，在此结束前不能赎回。

staker-dashboard.locked: 所有质押金额将在ETH 2.0合约期间被锁定。 不过，您将获得相应的aETH，您可以交易aETH。在aETH可用之前，您的资金将被锁定且无法赎回。

tip.txid: 以太坊交易ID。点击这里在以太坊浏览器上查看。

note.eth-node: 如果你没有，你可以通过 Infura or Ankr 建立一个节点

placeholder.eth-node: 复制你的以太坊节点链接到这里

not-enough-balance.title: To create your own node, you need to make deposit
not-enough-balance.text: To become a provider in Ankr Staking and earn platform fees, you need to set up an Ethereum 2.0 node with a minimum “insurance” stake of 2 ETH to compensate users in case of slashing events.

top-up.title: 充值余额
top-up.ankr-min-deposit-notice: 你的钱包中需要有{value} ANKR
top-up.eth-top-up-note:
请注意，如果您的保险金因罚没而降至 2 ETH 以下，您的节点可能会停止运行。为了防止这种情况发生，或者为了重新启动因此而停止的节点，请确保您的剩余保险余额至少为 2 ETH。您可以在这里将此金额充值。

另外需要注意的是，一旦存入，任何保险金额都会被锁定在Stkr系统中，直到合约结束（Ethereum 2.0 1.5阶段发布）。

aeth-promo.title: What is aETH?
aeth-promo.text: aETH is a synthetic derivative asset that enables instant liquidity for the Ethereum 2.0 network

aeth-reward.title:
One asset.
Combined value.
aeth-reward.primary-text: aETH represents the staked ETH plus all future staking rewards.
aeth-reward.secondary-text: Initially, aETH is issued at a ratio of 1:1 to the amount of ETH staked. Over time, 1 aETH is expected to grow in ETH value, as it contains the principal stake plus staking rewards.

aeth-advantages.title: Instant liquidity
aeth-advantages.primary-text: aETH allows you to stake Eth2 and redeem rewards before the phase 1.5 goes live and the lockup period ends (which can take up to several years!).
aeth-advantages.secondary-text: aETH is listed on Uniswap for immediate liquidity. aETH holders can also provide liquidity to the aETH/ETH pair on the exchange platform and earn from transaction fees.

aeth-ecosystem.subtitle: Ecosystem
aeth-ecosystem.title: Access Ankr's Eth2 staking services and aETH here

services.uniswap: Decentralized liquidity pools and trading for aETH.
services.metamask: Store aETH and connect with DeFi applications.
services.onx: aETH staking pools and yield strategies for collateralized assets.
services.bitkeep: Direct access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.trustwallet: Mobile access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.imtoken: Mobile access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.onto: Direct access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.snowswap: Incentivizing Eth2 adoption with aETH swaps and pools.
services.sushiswap: Decentralized trading and incentivized aETH liquidity pools.
services.curve: Decentralized liquidity pool for aETH with double reward mechanism.

aeth-start.title: New yield opportunities with aETH
aeth-start.text: aETH is easily accessible and tradable on various DeFi platforms, with a growing number of yield earning opportunities. Start staking now and try it yourself!

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.text: Deposit ETH on Staking Manager (you can deposit any amount starting from 0.5 ETH) by connecting your wallet to the Ankr Staking platform.

get-aeth.title: Get aETH
get-aeth.text: Once your ETH is staked on the Beaconchain, your aETH balance will be added to the Ankr Staking platform for you to redeem.

use-aeth.title: Use aETH
use-aeth.text: You can store aETH in your wallet to keep full control of your funds. You can also trade aETH or use it in DeFi products to earn yield. Please note that if you are trading aETH, you are effectively trading your entire investment (both the invested amount and the expected reward).

redeem.title: Redeem your ETH + staking rewards
redeem.text: As soon as Ethereum 2.0 transactions are activated, you can use your aETH to redeem your staked ETH + staking rewards on the Ankr Staking platform.

aeth-banner.title: How aETH works?
aeth-banner.text: Learn how aETH works and how you can use it.
